resources.string: Your device has only one camera

- Camera Measure allows you to measure the approximate distance and height of an object 
 - To measure: 
 	 Step 1: You must enter height of phone and building
 	 Step 2: you can measure the distance from you to an object by aiming at the BOTTOM (on the ground) of it. Press D button to show distance result
 	 Step 3: The height of an object can be measured with the measured distance (step 1). Press H button to show height result
